text: Niscaya yara e apabada [1] racana kareche, tara to tomadera'i ekati dala [2]; etake tomara tomadera jan'ya anistakara mane karo na; baram etato tomadera jan'ya kalyanakara; tadera pratyekera jan'ya ache tadera papakajera phala [3] ebam tadera madhye ye e byapare pradhana bhumika grahana kareche, tara jan'ya ache maha sasti
